fields.name: **Hallow's Sign (1x, Charge 50%)**:
fields.value: Deal an Astral Attack to one player. If the player you Attack cannot win with Town, permanently unlock the rest of your abilities and passives.

fields.name: **Hallow's Will (Locked)**:
fields.value: Attack a target player. You will attack one other visitor who cannot win with Town.

fields.name: **Sunlit Path (2x, Locked)**:
fields.value: Control one target player, forcing them to target another person with a random ability that directly targets. You learn their role and steal their notifications.

fields.name: **Celestial Burst (x2, Locked)**:
fields.value: Attack anyone who targets you tonight, even if they are an Astral Visitor. You won't attack anything that kills you while using this.

fields.name: **Face of a God (Locked)**:
fields.value: Your Attack Power and Defense Power are increased by 2, and you can use up to two abilities per night.
